title: Recitations
content:
The following recitation notes are from the undergraduate version of the course.
REC # Topics Files 1 Introduction: What are good questions for your project? (PDF) 2 Critical Thinking (PDF) 3 Taking Measurements (PDF) 4 Experimental Design I (PDF) 5 Feedback about Projects (PDF) 6 Probablility Theory, Sampling and Randomness (PDF) 7 Probability (PDF - 1.0MB) 8 Simple Statistics I (PDF - 1.7MB) 9 Statistics Homework (PDF - 1.3MB)
